reviewText: Glori Anne is beautiful, with a big chest and perfect butt and thighs.  She and others did a good job stripping.  I like Glori Anne Gilbert movies better----I feel that The House on Hooter Hill is her best and it has 4 other great porn stars

False marketing with the title of this DVD: Glori-Anne shows absolutely no pink, so don't get your hopes up.

She does do full nude and you get very fleeting glimpses of the downstairs area, but nothing to write home about. She is of course very hot, but I'm not sure that I've ever been more bored watching a hotter woman than I was with this DVD. One very static camera angle (looks like it was shot with an off-the-shelf camcorder), no true scene changes and several outfits that are made almost exactly the same way. I disagree with the other reviewer...the DVD actually is too long, not too short. We see the same stuff over and over and over again.

Still, she is hot...and I hovered between rating this three stars and four. The included extra with Brandy Gold (which is the same length as the main feature) ALMOST tipped the scales. Brandy shows more flesh than Glori-Anne does, and even though she isn't as attractive as Glori-Anne, she looks  great from the waist down. So I was all ready to rate this four stars until...

Well, I'm not sure how to say this in a review, but something really disgusting is visible during a couple of Brandy's segments. I was absolutely shocked to see that the director left these shots in the final cut. I have seen lots and lots and  LOTS of features like this one, but I've never seen a string before. Yet there it is, really blatantly visible.

No way does this earn four stars after THAT.
glori-anne is at her best in this dvd.  the out takes are funny as well. the only one problem i had with this dvd was it wasn't long enough.
